name: RTCIceTransport.getSelectedCandidatePair
description: The RTCIceTransport method getSelectedCandidatePair() returns an RTCIceCandidatePair object containing the current best-choice pair of ICE candidates describing the configuration of the endpoints of the transport.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
